useCase.name: Apply Style Guides in Design Process
useCase.description: As a Designer, I want to apply style guides in the design process to ensure consistency and quality.

preconditions.precondition: The designer should have access to the Guide Repository and CMS.

successEndConditions.condition: The guides are successfully applied in the design process.

failureEndConditions.condition: The guides cannot be accessed or applied correctly.

useCase.trigger: The designer requests existing guides and standards from the team member.

mainSequence.step: Designer requests existing guides and standards from Team Member.
Team Member shares a link to Guide Repository and CMS access with Designer.
Designer reviews and compiles relevant information from the guides available (Style, Design, Content).
Designer applies the guides in the design process.
Designer updates the repository with new/modified guides.
Team Member reviews and provides feedback on the guides shared by the Designer.
